title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate - Mr. Sakurai Presents "Pyra/Mythra"
author: Nintendo
description:
The power of the Aegis arrives to the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate roster on March 4th with the addition of Pyra/Mythra.

Check out the in-depth look at the new Super Smash Bros. Ultimate DLC fighter with Director Masahiro Sakurai!

#SmashBrosUltimate #NintendoSwitch #XenobladeChronicles

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

localize.description:
3月4日，随着Pyra/Mythra的加入，Aegis的力量来到了《超级大乱斗兄弟终极版》的阵容中。

请随樱井正弘导演一起深入了解《超级大乱斗兄弟终极版》新DLC战士的情况吧!

#SmashBrosUltimate #NintendoSwitch #XenobladeChronicles

订阅更多任天堂的乐趣！https://goo.gl/HYYsot

localize.title: 超级大乱斗兄弟终极版--樱井先生呈现 "Pyra/Mythra"

localize.description:
3月4日，隨着Pyra/Mythra的加入，Aegis的力量來到了《超級大亂鬥兄弟終極版》的陣容中。

請隨櫻井正弘導演一起深入瞭解《超級大亂鬥兄弟終極版》新DLC戰士的情況吧!
